Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsAround 9 pm last nigh i was watching tv and a flashing light caught my attention.i went to the window and looked at it for a few seconds.I then took my binochulars and went outside and watchedthis craft for about 9 or ten min.buy naked eye it looks as if the lights just strobebut through the binochulars it was rotateing counter clockwise.The craft was oval shaped with what looked like port hole windows that were lite up solid amber.there were red green and blue strobeing lights on it also.i watched it move west to east slowly it came to a hover over446 for abouttwo min.id say it was about 9 hundred feet up.after hovering it stared to slowly move north toward then slowly chane back to the east where it then started an what looked loike a desent approch.It then whent behind trees and i lost sight.as it hung over 446 there was complete silence outside as it started to move againthe woods behind my house came alive it sounded like a whole herd of deer were running around.this was no plane or helecopter it was silent and was a struktured craft.

Summary: amber colored with blue green and red strobing lights
